department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: The Canadian government is soliciting bids for 2 box cutters with hot and cold glue attachments to be installed at the Department of National Defense
description: The Canadian government seeks a contractor to install 2 box cutters with hot and cold glue attachments at the Department of National Defense. The project involves training on the use of the equipment. The equipment must be delivered on or before March 31, 2024. Bid closing date is December 5, 2023 at 2pm ET.
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
### **Government Tender Announcement**
 
 * **Request Number**: WS3919828210-Doc4288627793 
 * **Amendment Number**: 2
 * **Publication Date**: 2023-11-02
 * **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-05T14:00:00
 
### **Solicitation Details**

* **Title**: Acquisition of Box Cutters with Hot and Cold Glue Attachments
* **UDA Output Id**: W0100-233973 B
* **Request Number**: WS3919828210
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive-Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Halifax, NS

### **Contracting Entity**

* **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Person:** Matthew (SPAC/PSPC) (he/him)
* **Contact Email:** matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### **Bid Description**

This request for proposal cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number W0100-233973, dated June 12, 2023, closing on July 5, 2023, at 1400 EST. A debriefing session will be provided upon the written request of bidders who bid on the previous solicitation.

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of two box cutters with hot and cold glue attachments. The contractor is required to install the items, train users, and deliver all goods on or before March 31, 2024. No security requirements are associated with this solicitation. Successful proponents will be provided a contract.

Bidders can request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days from the notification of an unsuccessful bid. 

Note: Bidders are responsible for reviewing the solicitation documents carefully before submitting a bid.
